verse:
ईश्वराणां वचः सत्यं तथैवाचरितं क्‍वचित् ।
तेषां यत् स्ववचोयुक्तं बुद्धिमांस्तत् समाचरेत् ॥
meaning: जो समर्थ लोग हैं उनके उपदेश को मानना चाहिए वो जो कर रहे हैं वो नहीं करना चाहिए

terms.nirahaṅkāriṇām: who are free from false ego

vedabase.translation: My dear Prabhu, when these great persons who are free from false ego act piously in this world, they have no selfish motives to fulfill, and even when they act in apparent contradiction to the laws of piety, they are not subject to sinful reactions.

terms.स्ववचः युक्तं: is in accordance with their words
terms.बुद्धिमान् तत् समाचरेत्: a wise person should conduct themselves in that manner

bard.meaning: By acting virtuously, they do not attain self-interest or harm here, O Lord, of the non-egoists
